verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
I'm goin' home.
Going back to the bosom of my Father.
He's callin' me; He's callin' me
Up to the fountain of the waters.
As the salmon returns from the sea,
He's callin' me; He's callin' me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Comin' out of the salt of the sea,
Pressin' on through the strength of the stream,
Past the fowls of the air,
And the hungry bear,
He's callin' me; He's callin' me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Goin' back through the veil of the flesh,
Through the fire to purge out the dross.
The way of the cross,
Counting all else as loss.
He's callin' me; He's callin' me.
